member.name: F:MalApi.MalAnimeType.Unknown
member.summary: The type has not been entered in MAL's database yet.

member.name: T:MalApi.RetryOnFailureMyAnimeListApi
member.summary: Retries failed requests after waiting for a short period. After a certain number of failures, it gives up and propagates the thrown exception.

member.name: T:MalApi.RateLimitingMyAnimeListApi
member.summary: Limits MAL requests by waiting a given time period betwen each request. The time is measured from before one request is made to before the next request is made. You might use this to be nice to MAL and avoid making requests as fast as possible. This class is thread-safe if the underlying API is.

member.name: T:MalApi.MyAnimeListApi
member.summary: Class for accessing myanimelist.net. Methods are thread-safe. Properties are not.

member.name: M:MalApi.MyAnimeListApi.SanitizeAnimeListXml(System.IO.TextReader)
member.summary: Sanitizes anime list XML which is not always well-formed. If a user uses & characters in their tags, they will not be escaped in the XML.

member.name: M:MalApi.MyAnimeListApi.GetRecentOnlineUsers
member.summary: Gets a list of users that have been on MAL recently. This scrapes the HTML on the recent users page and therefore can break if MAL changes the HTML on that page.

member.name: P:MalApi.MyAnimeListApi.UserAgent
member.summary: What to set the user agent http header to in API requests. Null to use the default .NET user agent.

member.name: P:MalApi.MyAnimeListApi.TimeoutInMs
member.summary: Timeout in milliseconds for requests to MAL. Defaults to 15000 (15s).

member.name: T:MalApi.UncertainDate
member.summary: Date where the year, month, and day can be unknown or not specified. A year of 2005, month of 7, and null day would indicate July 2005.

member.name: M:MalApi.UncertainDate.FromMalDateString(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an UncertainDate from the format MAL uses in its XML, YYYY-MM-DD with 00 or 0000 indicating an unknown. 2005-07-00 would indicate July 2005.

member.name: T:MalApi.MalUserNotFoundException
member.summary: Indicates that the user tha was searched for does not exist.

member.name: P:MalApi.MalUserLookupResults.CanonicalUserName
member.summary: The user name as it appears in MAL. This might differ in capitalization from the username that was searched for.

member.name: T:MalApi.MyAnimeListCache
member.summary: Thread-safe cache with an optional expiration time. If the expiration time is null, anime lists are cached for the lifetime of the object. Expired cache entries are only actually removed when a new anime list is inserted into the cache. Cache expiration measurement is susceptible to changes to the system clock.

member.name: T:MalApi.MalApiRequestException
member.summary: Thrown when there is an error communicating with MAL.

member.name: T:MalApi.CachingMyAnimeListApi
member.summary: This class is thread-safe if the underlying API is. If the expiration time is null, anime lists are cached for the lifetime of the object. Expired cache entries are only actually removed when a new anime list is inserted into the cache. Cache expiration measurement is susceptible to changes to the system clock.

member.name: P:MalApi.MalAnimeInfoFromUserLookup.Type
member.summary: Could be something other than the enumerated values if MAL adds new types!

member.name: P:MalApi.MalAnimeInfoFromUserLookup.NumEpisodes
member.summary: Could be 0 for anime that hasn't aired yet or less than the planned number of episodes for a series currently airing.
